duties_responsibilities.duty: Diagnose and treat human injuries, diseases, and deformities, including symptoms, treatment alternatives, drug properties, and interactions.
Rehabilitate physical and mental dysfunctions through diagnosis, treatment, and rehabilitation.
Utilize verbal and written communication skills to interact with patients and medical staff.
Develop and implement comprehensive outcomes-based patient treatment plans.
Counsel patients concerning medical and psychological/psychiatric conditions, treatment plans, and behavior modification.
Interpret and evaluate laboratory and other diagnostic tests.

education_certification.credential: Current license to practice as an Acute Care Nurse Practitioner
Basic Life Support (BLS) certification within 30 days of hire or transfer
